alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 2:39AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Evangeline, southwestern Avoyelles and northwestern St. Landry Parishes through 315 AM CDT... At 239 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Reddell, or 7 miles northwest of Mamou, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eunice, Ville Platte, Mamou, Turkey Creek, Pine Prairie, Chataignier, Bayou Chicot, Indian Lake, Savoy, Chicot State Park, Duralde, Swords, Beaver, Reddell and St. Landry. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 40 and 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for central and southwestern Louisiana.
